snippet: Christine C. Quinn opened up about her bulimia and the alcoholism that accompanied it, which she will discuss at a speech at Barnard College and in a memoir to be published next month.
abstract: Christine C Quinn, speaker of the New York City Council and a Democratic candidate for mayor, is making public for the first time, her bulimia and the alcoholism that accompanied it; she will speak about her experience at Barnard College, and touch on it in a memoir to be published next month.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn opened up about her bulimia and the alcoholism that accompanied it, which she will discuss at a speech at Barnard College and in a memoir to be published next month.

headline.seo: Christine Quinn Opens Up About Her Struggles Against Bulimia and Alcoholism
headline.main: Council Speaker Recounts Her Struggles With Bulimia and Alcoholism
headline.print_headline: Council Speaker Recounts Her Struggles With Bulimia and Alcoholism
